text: Nan adarasi, ia Godɨn gumazamizir igharaziba akar kurabar me mɨkɨman markɨ. Gumazim akar kuramɨn igharazitav mɨkeme, o akam a gasi, an akar kuramɨn Moses Osirizir Arazibav gei, egha a Moses Osirizir Araziba iria. Ezɨ ia Moses Osirizir Araziba iria, ia mati gumazim Moses Osirizir Arazibar apengan itir pu. Puvatɨ. Ia mati jasɨn mɨn oto.(4:11) Moses Osirizir Arazibar aven itir akar otevir kam, Jems ti vezɨn kamɨn a ginɨrɨ. Kar akar Wok Pris 19:18 ko Jems 2:8ɨn itim.
